title: Best of The Herd: 04/19/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/19/2019
description:
Colin says there are great NBA players and then there is Kevin Durant because he has completely separated himself as the best player in the league.  He says the difference in NFL schedules will be the difference in one team winning the NFC North.  Plus, 3x College Football  National Champion and new FOX CFB Analyst Urban Meyer tells Colin why Dwayne Haskins isn't ready just yet to lead a franchise.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
